---

## Motivation

What problem does this suggestion solve for students or staff?

## Proposal

Describe the change you would like to see (content updates, new datasets, tooling tweaks, etc.).

## Affected Files / Labs

- List the labs, datasets, or scripts that would change.

## Alternatives Considered

Mention any other approaches you evaluated.

## Additional Context

Links, references, or mock-ups that help reviewers understand the request.
